Dr. Burnett's reflections upon a book entituled Parliamentum pacificum. The first part answered by the author. Northleigh, John, 1657-1705. Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715. Reflections on a late pamphlet entituled Parliamentum pacificum. Northleigh, John, 1657-1705. Parliamentum pacificum.
147 p.
Printed and are to be sold by Matthew Turner, London : 1688.
Attributed by NUC to Northleigh. Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
